name: One of a Kind 100 Pack of Mixed Cards(ON SALE PLUS FREE Gift)
description:
This does not happen often so take advantage of this sale now. Get 100 Greeting Cards that generally range from $3.00 - $6.00 per card for only $65.00. Card shown below is indicative of the quality of cards you will get; you will not necessarily get the card shown below. YOU WILL ALSO GET A FREE CHARM BRACELET INCLUDED WITH YOUR ORDER.

Here is a breakdown on the Greeting Cards you will receive:
25 Christmas
10 Baby Shower
15 Wedding
25 Variety Birthday (Male, Female, Milestone, Boy, Girl, Etc.)
5 Thank You
5 Sympathy
10 Encouragement & Thinking of you
5 Friendship

Pay $65.00 and get the rest of the greeting cards that you will need for the next year or so. No more going to the store at the last minute or no more having your Greeting card given out by multiple people. Be Original and Stand out among your family and friends with Klazzy Kre8tions Greeting Cards. 


Here are some examples of our  writings included in the inside of the greeting cards:

Home for the holidays & all the festivities
Good food and gift exchanges
Amongst friends and family
Being with those we love
Is what makes this season great
The laughs once we get together
Are definitely worth the wait
Although the snow is falling
And it's oh so cold outside
We enjoy this time of year
Our family kicks it live!
You make my Christmas Merry
So Merry Christmas to you!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

Count your blessings 
Is something we should do everyday
But especially this time of year
As we think of and do things
that bring us holiday cheer 
A time for families
to catch up, laugh and joke
As you prepare for Christmas dinner
as you let the greens soak 
Christmas is a time for remembrance 
and reflection...
A time to sit around and eat 
Nana's Peach Cobbler which is 
cooked to golden perfection 
All year long you've waited for this
Family, cooking, and laughter 
Something you can't miss 
These are things that make 
Christmas so nice
Spending time with family?
You wouldn't have to think twice. 
So this year as you hold the ones
you love near. 
Have a Merry Christmas & Happy A New Year!
© Shanese Shields 2010

Today, this day, your lives combine 
Love of the heart, soul, body and mind 
Everlasting love, this union of one 
Mr. and Mrs. you now become 
I'm glad you found this love so rare 
The two of you are the perfect pair 
Congratulations on your new life 
Together as one, now husband and wife 
© Alysia Townsend 2010

This magical moment when two unite
You're now conjoined 
As husband and wife
Your love announced
For us all to see
Your joyful leap 
To Holy Matrimony 
There's no couple more 
deserving than you two
Congratulations! 
I'm so happy for you!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

You can't change the 
past....
You can only learn 
from it and make sure
you don't make the same 
mistakes in the present and future. 
Sometimes
God throws obstacles 
in our life so we learn that 
we are capable of overcoming them!
Stay encouraged!
© Shanese Shields 2011

I know this is new to you, and you sometimes may wonder what you should do.
Should you cry, should you yell, or simply walk away...
But your baby will smile at you and then you'll stay....
and say...
This isn't so bad after all, and you will stand proud and tall. 
Remember those good times, when the bad times come.
Because unfortunately  there will be some. 
And those are the times you may feel mad or even sad. 
But the good times will always out weigh the bad. 
Always remember, Parenthood 
is a blessing from above. 
Filled with hugs and kisses
and lots of Love. 
Congratulations you two!
© Shanese Shields 2009

A mommy to be
Waiting Patiently 
To hold your little one
Your time will soon come
Your face is a glow 
With child you behold
This time next year
Your child will be here
Yes, arrival at last
Parenthood a blast
What I want to say
is Happy Mommy-to-be-Day
© Alysia Townsend 2009

To see more examples of our Greeting Cards please visit our website: http://www.klazzykre8tions.com/fancy1.html or http://www.klazzykre8tions.com/Simple--Greeting--Gallery.html

name: One of a Kind 50 Pack of Christmas Cards (ON SALE PLUS FREE SHIPPING)
description:
This does not happen often so take advantage of this sale now. Get 50 Christmas Cards that generally range from $3.00 - $6.00 per card for only $40.00. Plus FREE SHIPPING!
Card shown below is indicative of the quality of cards you will get; you will not necessarily get the card shown below. Here are some examples of our Christmas Cards writings included in the inside of the greeting cards:

Home for the holidays & all the festivities
Good food and gift exchanges
Amongst friends and family
Being with those we love
Is what makes this season great
The laughs once we get together
Are definitely worth the wait
Although the snow is falling
And it's oh so cold outside
We enjoy this time of year
Our family kicks it live!
You make my Christmas Merry
So Merry Christmas to you!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

Count your blessings 
Is something we should do everyday
But especially this time of year
As we think of and do things
that bring us holiday cheer 
A time for families
to catch up, laugh and joke
As you prepare for Christmas dinner
as you let the greens soak 
Christmas is a time for remembrance 
and reflection...
A time to sit around and eat 
Nana's Peach Cobbler which is 
cooked to golden perfection 
All year long you've waited for this
Family, cooking, and laughter 
Something you can't miss 
These are things that make 
Christmas so nice
Spending time with family?
You wouldn't have to think twice. 
So this year as you hold the ones
you love near. 
Have a Merry Christmas & Happy A New Year!
© Shanese Shields 2010

Peace on Earth and blessings worldwide
Would be a great gift at Christmastime
And not only then but all year round
Happiness and joy would be all to be found
And although I wish this for everyone
I can only spread my joy but to some
So here's this greeting I send your way
Wishing you the happiest Holidays!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

To see more examples of our Greeting Cards please visit our website: http://www.klazzykre8tions.com/fancy1.html or http://www.klazzykre8tions.com/Simple--Greeting--Gallery.html

name: One of a Kind 40 Pack of Christmas Cards (ON SALE)
description:
This does not happen often so take advantage of this sale now. Get 40 Christmas Cards that generally range from $3.00 - $6.00 per card for only $34.00. Plus a Flat Rate of Shipping for $3.95. Card shown below is indicative of the quality of cards you will get; you will not necessarily get the card shown below. Here are some examples of our Christmas Cards writings included in the inside of the greeting cards:

Home for the holidays & all the festivities
Good food and gift exchanges
Amongst friends and family
Being with those we love
Is what makes this season great
The laughs once we get together
Are definitely worth the wait
Although the snow is falling
And it's oh so cold outside
We enjoy this time of year
Our family kicks it live!
You make my Christmas Merry
So Merry Christmas to you!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

It's Christmastime, It's Christmastime! What does that mean?
Christmas trees, Mistletoe & whole lot of red and green.
There's tons of shopping & cooking that needs to be done....
and other annual family traditions that are always fun. 
Gotta get in that kitchen to clean those greens...
Lord knows if they are gritty that's going to cause a scene. 
Gotta make sure the yams aren't too sweet. Gotta make sure the knife is sharp
so we can slice the meat. As we bow our head to bless our food.
Give it up to Jesus cause he is one cool dude. 
As we celebrate, laugh & joke, let's give praise to Jesus 
cause he is the reason
that we celebrate this season! 
Merry Christmas!
© Shanese Shields 2010

Peace on Earth and blessings worldwide
Would be a great gift at Christmastime
And not only then but all year round
Happiness and joy would be all to be found
And although I wish this for everyone
I can only spread my joy but to some
So here's this greeting I send your way
Wishing you the happiest Holidays!
© Alysia Townsend 2010

It's Christmastime, It's Christmastime! What does that mean?
Christmas trees, Mistletoe & whole lot of red and green.

and other annual family traditions that are always fun.

Tis the season to be happy
I hope this year my gifts aren't crappy
I pray that all food that's cooked
Taste as good as it looks 
I hope only the people I like 
come over this year
That would bring me tons of 
holiday cheer
So this year don't expect an invite
Next year if you're nice and not naughty
you might! 
Oh Well...
Better luck next year!
Merry Christmas Anyway! 
© Shanese Shields 2010
